Verses.4: My siblings, you are not in darkness. The day of the Lord will not surprise you like a thief.
Verses.5: All of you are children of light, and children of the day. We do not belong to the night, nor to darkness.
Verses.9: There won't be wrath for us. Instead, God has destined us to receive salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ,
Verses.10: who died for us. Together we will live with Him. No matter if we are awake or asleep.
Verses.23: May the God of peace Himself, wholly sanctify you. That your spirit, soul, and body be completely preserved, and without blemish at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Verses.24: Faithful is He who calls you, and He will also see it through to the end.
